scripts.dev: npm run clean && eleventy --serve --port=1234 & npm run compile-scripts-dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile-scripts-prod && NODE_ENV='production' eleventy
scripts.push-to-gh-pages: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix _site master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.build-and-push-to-gh-pages: npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && npm run push-to-gh-pages
